# **About Me**  

Hardworking public health professional attending [Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/) in the [Department of Epidemiology](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/academics/departments/epidemiology). Passionate about addressing inequities and breaking intergenerational traumas through research. Areas of focus: [lifecourse](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/research/imprints-center/lifecourse-studies) epidemiology, mental health, maternal and child health.
